author: Jeroen Van Hecke
description: THROW all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).
name: Cantinero Coffee
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)
